ModMetaData.name: Godlike Trait
ModMetaData.author: Phunky
ModMetaData.description:
This is very much a cheat mod, as a pawn with this trait can do everything a regular pawn can almost instantly.
Godlike Trait: - Animals: +20 - Artistic: +20 - Construction: +20 - Cooking: +20 - Crafting: +20 - Plants: +20 - Intellectual: +20 - Medical: +20 - Melee: +20 - Mining: +20 - Shooting: +20 - Social: +20 - Permanent mood effect +120 - Global learning factor +500% - Melee hit chance +20.0 - Melee dodge chance +20.0 - Pain shock threshold +2000% - Move speed +5.00 - Mental break threshold -150% - Global work speed +500% - Aiming time -1000% - Shooting accuracy +20.0 - Immunity gain speed +500% - Toxic resistance +500% - Toxic environment resistance +500% - Research speed +500% - Social impact +500.00% - Tame animal chance +500.00% - Train animal chance +500.00% - Carrying capacity +200 - Min comfortable temperature -90.0F - Max comfortable temperature +90.0F - Incoming damage multiplier x10% - Recreation fall rate x10% - Sleep fall rate x10% - Hunger rate x10%
Feel free to send me suggestions/bug reports on discord at Phunky#0001 or on the github repo at https://github.com/Phnky/rimworld-godlike-mod
https://www.youtube.com/Phunky https://www.github.com/Phnky

20190305 -set commonality to .01% -changed ingame trait description -removed gifs from mod folder
20200725 -removed psycic sensitivity invulnerability to allow psylink powers
